5.title: ğŸªœ Design Pillars ğŸªœ
5.content: Hyper Accessibility . Community engager . | make leader feel important and be recognizable | . Shareable . Multi-taskable . Short Sessions . Leave anytime, join anytime . Positive reinforcement .

6.title: ğŸƒ Player Motivations ğŸƒ
6.content: ğŸ¤ Cooperation . Players are highly motivated to seek each other out and team up. Players progress faster in groups, are able to help each other out directly using their character abilities. ğŸ† Competition . Teams will have statistics of individual performance (damage, healing, â€¦) displayed at all times which will motivate players to top the team leaderboard. ğŸ”¥ Destruction . The combat will cause destruction to the environment and enemies in an over-the-top fireworks-display comical manner. ğŸ’ª Progression . In a short 15 minute session players will progress rapidly in their character and be reset at the end of the session. In the metagame players can empower their characters by expending currecny. ğŸ” Discovery . Players will be able to discover a variety of unique and different environments, characters, and enemies over their sessions.

8.title: ğŸ¯ Players Goal ğŸ¯
8.content: The playersğŸ§™ goal is to gain as much life essenceğŸŒ¿ as possible. Life essence is used to upgrade charactersğŸ’ª in the metagame. The longer the player is able to defend the sanctuaryğŸŒ±, the more life essence is gained. Players are able to last longer by: . | Finding playersğŸ§™ to team up with by inviting them via a linkğŸ”— or finding them in the void, which adds more defendersğŸ›¡ï¸ to the sanctuaryğŸŒ±. | Gathering life essenceğŸŒ¿ from the sanctuary efficently by avoiding taking damageğŸ’– from enemiesğŸ‘¹. | Starting strongerğŸ’ª by upgrading characters in the metagame using life essenceğŸŒ¿. | .

21.title: Overview
21.content: Void Survivors* is an atmospheric free-to-play social dungeon crawling multiplayer game where hundreds of players group together to survive for as long as possible against incresingly difficult waves of whimsical fantasy monsters. * Working title . The game is currently under development and Universe Builders are seeking funding to be able to complete Pre-Production. ğŸ¨ Art Style . 2.5D, fixed camera, isometric, fantasy, voxels . ğŸ› ï¸ Mechanics . | Movement in 2D | Auto-target combat | Telegraphed attacks | Roles (Tank, Healer, DPS, Crowd Control, â€¦) | . ğŸ•¹ï¸ Player Motivations . ğŸ¤ Â  Cooperation ğŸ† Â  Competition ğŸ”¥ Â  Destruction ğŸ’ª Â  Progression ğŸ” Â  Discovery . ğŸ’­ Player Fantasies . | Playing and interacting with large groups of players (100+) to overcome challenges | Playing an impactful role in a group | Playing with friends and existing communities | Playing with popular streamers | . âŒ› Session Length . 15 minutes . ğŸ‘ª Target Market . ğŸ“º Target Platforms . ğŸŒ Web Browsers Â Â Â Â Chrome for Linux, Windows, MacOSX, Android, iPhone, Smart TVâ€™s Â Â Â Â Firefox for Linux, Windows, MacOSX, Android Â Â Â Â Safari for MacOSX, iPhone . ğŸ“º Controls . âŒ¨ï¸ Â  WASD or Arrows ğŸ® Â  Joystick ğŸ“± Â  One touch controls . ğŸ“‡ Tags . MMO, Multiplayer, Cooperative, Touch screen support, Full controller support, In-App Purchases, RPG, Achievements. ğŸ‘‰ Gameplay Inspirations . | Vampire Survivors | Soulstone Survivors | World of Warcraft - Raids | .

23.title: Home
23.content: Universe Builders is a game development studio located in Melbourne Australia focusing on the development of highly accessibile massively multiplayer games for the Web, Mobile, Windows, Linux, and PC.

28.title: Narrative Direction
28.content: . | Players play in a void and spawn life around them. The longer they stay in one spot the more lush the life becomes, the larger it becomes, but the more it attracts the void to lash back against it. | All about cooperation, and banding together . | Inspiration: The void in Shadow and Bone. | . It begs to question, with enough players spreading bringing into the void life would the void be quenched entirely? .
